title: American English
summary: American English (AmE, AE, AmEng, USEng, en-US),[lower-alpha 1] sometimes called United States English or U.S. English,[5][6] is the set of varieties of the English language native to the United States.[7] English is the most widely spoken language in the United States and  in most circumstances is the de facto common language used in government, education, and commerce. Currently, American English is the most influential form of English worldwide.[8][9][10][11][12][13]
